panel__settings__downloads__subheader.message: Enables support for local browser downloads.

panel__settings__downloads__buttons__sub.message: Navbar batch buttons also apply to downloads.

panel__settings__downloads__transfer__re.message: Resume download when transfer fails within popup.

panel__settings__downloads__transfer__mo.message: Open a task creation modal on transferred downloads within popup.

panel__settings__downloads__intercept__e.message: Intercept downloads in injected scripts (within browser tabs).

panel__settings__downloads__intercept__w.message: Download interception is currently in alpha. Interception might fail or task might be incorrectly created or cancelled.

panel__settings__downloads__intercept__e.message: Erases intercepted downloads in injected scripts (within browser tabs).

panel__settings__downloads__intercept__m.message: Enabled dropdown and/or modal for interception.
Note that modal and dropdown support is experimental. Interception might fail.

panel__settings__downloads__intercept__r.message: Resume download for failed (or cancelled) transfers in injected scripts (within browser tabs).

panel__settings__downloads__intercept__a.message: If this is enabled, extensions are ignored and all downloads are intercepted.

panel__settings__downloads__intercept__e.message: Intercepts supported extensions and mime types. When adding a new extension we recommend adding the corresponding mime type to increase safety.
